text: Hagi Filistia vahe'mo'za Juda agonaramimofo agafine, Negevi kazigama me'nea kumatmina arohu eme zamare'za, Bet-semesi kumapi vahetamine, Aijaloni kumapi vahetamine, Gederoti kumapi vahetamine, Soko kumapima nemaniza vahe'ene tavaonte'ma megagi'nea kumatmimpi vahetamine, Timna kuma'ma, tavaonte'ma megagi'nea kumatmimpi vahetamine, Gimzo kuma'ma, tavaonte'ma megagi'nea kumapi vahetamine maka ha eme huzmante'za zamahe'za hanare'za, ana kumatamimpi mani'naze.
